scripts.install:all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.copy:frontend: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src='frontend/dist/dms-frontend';const dest='backend/public';if(fs.existsSync(dest))fs.rmSync(dest,{recursive:true});fs.cpSync(src,dest,{recursive:true});console.log('Frontend copied to backend/public')"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run copy:frontend
